The world, as we know it, is endangered

There are many conflicting studies about how much time we have left to take large climate action, but there is one thing that everyone agrees on: we need to act fast.














We at Clean Westchester are taking action, not with theoreticals, cheap talk, or meaningless fundraisers, but with actual boots on the ground action.



What we are Doing üå≥

Our main goal is to make Westchester a cleaner place for everyone, and the way that we approach that is multifaceted, with approaches such as clean ups and informative articles surrounding pressing environmental issues.


About Us

Created in February of 2022, we are an interconnected community of students across Westchester that seeks to eliminate all sorts of pollution plaguing our local environments.

Articles

Ranging from discussions regarding global environmental issues to highlights of volunteer projects, here you can access a list of our articles written by members of our team.

Contact Us

Please contact us with any queries or concerns. We are always looking for new chapters and are always interested in talking, so please feel free to shoot us a quick email below!

Wall of Heroes

Volunteers deserve recognition. The Wall of Heroes depicts every environmental service, whether it be a beach clean-up or invasive plant management, or any other activities that anyone has engaged in.



Join us as a Chapter! üìö

We are intrested in expanding our efforts into more districts, if you are intrested in founding a chapter in your school district please contact us!

Clean Westchester

Clean Westchester is a student founded and run organization that focuses on making Westchester a cleaner place for everyone. We are always looking for opportunities to expand and to teach in classes, so please reach out!
